title: Why is it
body:
That fiora STILL has an AS slow on her fucking W.

I am so sick of that fact, she can block all CC, stun you, but if she doesn't manage to stop anything, as long as it hits you, you lose the trade.

Legitimately sick of these champions that have no actual skill involved.

replies.body:
you aren't going to like top cho'gath, jungle warwick, midlane veigar, adc sivir or support soraka then. There are a number of champions in this game that don't really require much skill (I main alot these) but on the flipside to that they are incredible predictable and will rarely surprise or outplay you and they generally don't have as much power and potential as higher skillcap champions.

All of this said Fiora is definitely not a lowskillcap champion and she relies on parrying alot of spells and knowing when to all in to win fights. As the super noob I am I can't do this and so I would rather play something like cho'gath who has a aoe silence, knockup, sustain, aa enhancer, massive natural tank stats and a chunking true damage ult. Play against or as cho'gath and you'll learn what lowskill-high reward means.

>All of this said Fiora is definitely not a lowskillcap champion and she relies on parrying alot of spells

I started losing to her, simply because she hit me with her W's, and i couldn't actually trade with her.

I had CC, and she wasn't avoiding anything, but simply won because the AS slow stopped me from fighting back.
